item.title: Popular Vehicles & Services Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs 86
item.description: Popular Vehicles & Services Ltd has touched a new 52-week and all-time low of Rs.86 today, marking a significant decline amid a sustained downtrend. The stock has underperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting ongoing pressures on its financial and market performance. Time: 9 minutes ago

item.title: SIS Ltd Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.289.15 Amidst Continued Underperformance
item.description: SIS Ltd, a key player in the Diversified Commercial Services sector, recorded a fresh 52-week low of Rs.289.15 today, marking a significant decline amid broader market fluctuations and persistent challenges in its financial performance. The stock’s fall to this level underscores ongoing concerns regarding its growth trajectory and relative market positioning. Time: 9 minutes ago

item.title: Ruchira Papers Ltd Stock Hits 52-Week Low Amid Continued Earnings Pressure
item.description: Ruchira Papers Ltd’s shares touched a fresh 52-week low of Rs.103.15 today, marking a significant decline amid ongoing financial headwinds. The stock’s performance reflects persistent challenges in revenue and profitability, with the company’s recent quarterly results underscoring a continuation of subdued earnings trends. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Jindal Steel Ltd. Hits New 52-Week High of Rs.1238 on 24 Feb 2026
item.description: Jindal Steel Ltd. has surged to a fresh 52-week and all-time high of Rs.1238, reflecting robust momentum in the ferrous metals sector despite broader market headwinds. The stock’s recent rally underscores its outperformance relative to both its sector and the benchmark Sensex over the past year. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Last Mile Enterprises Ltd Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.5.83

The stock has underperformed its sector and broader market indices, reflecting ongoing pressures on its financial performance and valuation metrics. Time: 10 minutes ago

item.title: Endurance Technologies Ltd. Hits Intraday High with 5.06% Surge on 24 Feb 2026
item.description: Endurance Technologies Ltd. demonstrated robust intraday strength on 24 Feb 2026, surging 5.06% to touch a day’s high of Rs 2,700.45. This performance notably outpaced the Auto Components & Equipments sector and the broader market, underscoring the stock’s resilience amid a declining Sensex. Time: 14 minutes ago

item.title: Hexaware Technologies Ltd Hits Intraday Low Amid Price Pressure on 24 Feb 2026
item.description: Hexaware Technologies Ltd experienced a significant intraday decline on 24 Feb 2026, touching a new 52-week low of Rs 477 as the stock faced notable price pressure amid broader market weakness and sector underperformance. Time: 14 minutes ago

item.title: Swiggy Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amidst Bearish Price Action
item.description: Swiggy Ltd, a prominent player in the E-Retail and E-Commerce sector, has witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, rising by 10.98% to 51,975 contracts. This increase comes amid a sustained downtrend in the stock price, which has declined over 6% in the past four trading sessions, signalling a complex interplay of market positioning and investor sentiment. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: FSN E-Commerce Ventures Ltd, the parent company of NYKAA, witnessed a notable 10.0% increase in open interest in its derivatives segment on 24 Feb 2026, signalling heightened market activity despite the stock underperforming its sector and broader indices. This surge in open interest, coupled with volume and price action, offers insights into evolving market positioning and potential directional bets among traders. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: Premier Energies Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Mixed Market Signals
item.description: Premier Energies Ltd (NSE: PREMIERENE), a mid-cap player in the Other Electrical Equipment sector, has witnessed a notable 14.9% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite this, the stock underperformed its sector and broader indices on 24 Feb 2026, reflecting a complex interplay of factors influencing its near-term outlook. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: Eternal Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amidst Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: Eternal Ltd, a prominent player in the E-Retail and E-Commerce sector, has witnessed a significant 16.6% surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity despite the stock’s ongoing six-day losing streak and a 11.4% decline over the period. item.title: KPIT Technologies Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: KPIT Technologies Ltd has witnessed a notable surge in open interest in its derivatives segment, coinciding with a sustained decline in its share price. item.title: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amid Bullish Market Positioning
item.description: Sun Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd (SUNPHARMA) has witnessed a notable surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling increased market participation and potential directional bets. The stock’s open interest rose by 13.46% to 1,49,669 contracts from the previous 1,31,919, accompanied by robust volume and rising investor interest, reflecting a bullish undertone in the pharmaceuticals sector. item.title: Yes Bank Ltd. Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amidst Mixed Market Signals

item.title: SRF Ltd. Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Downward Price Pressure

item.title: Steel Authority Of India Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bullish Market Positioning
item.description: Steel Authority Of India Ltd. (SAIL) has witnessed a significant surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor sentiment. The stock’s open interest jumped by 32.67% to 66,235 contracts from 49,924, accompanied by robust volume and rising investor participation, suggesting a potential directional bet on the ferrous metals giant as it nears its 52-week high. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: Inox Wind Ltd Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action
item.description: Inox Wind Ltd, a key player in the Heavy Electrical Equipment sector, has witnessed a significant 14.7% surge in open interest (OI) in its derivatives segment, signalling heightened market activity and shifting investor positioning. Despite this spike, the stock continues to underperform, hitting a fresh 52-week low and trading below all major moving averages, reflecting persistent bearish sentiment. Time: 15 minutes ago

item.title: TVS Motor Company Sees Significant Open Interest Surge Amidst Mixed Market Signals
